author: peter.davies
content:
My observation is that build system integration tends to get locked in early in a language's history. So the newer the language the better the build system (due to overall improvements in build system design).

Rust > Haskell > Python > C in terms of build systems just because of the age of those languages.

I think something similar applies to doc tools.

author: peter.davies
